column4: Hi, Im trying to back up one of my DVDs that I just bought to prevent scratches. It's a DVD9, and I want it to fit on a DVD5. K9copy always crashes when it gets to 99 percent of the read. Any way to copy from the command line or with another application? I want original menus etc.
Tried that erpo, but I can't get wine to recognize my drives. I've tried by going through and setting the right windows nt and all that, with no luck
I'm  using what ever comes out of the repos on edgy so I'd think so
- have you added the /dev/hdXX link to dosdevices/d::
